Articles.Content: Hello. I would like to report a problem.  You see, my 5m engine plate is decoupling prematurely. Could it be a kraken? If anyone can fix this problem, please reply.

You may have set the staging on the engine plate incorrectly.  Check "Advanced Tweakables" in settings, then open the engine plate PAW and it should show an option to disable staging on the plate if that's what you want.  Otherwise...  check yo' stagin'!

Edited October 19, 2021 by Entropian
